intro:
Enjoy one week of messy ink battles from April 30th until May 6th with the Splatoon 2: Special Demo!

Claim turf anytime, anywhere, with anyone in Splatoon 2, only on Nintendo Switch. Traditional 4-on-4 turf battles return in this full sequel, along with returning modes, new stages, new fashions, new weapons and much more! 

From April 30th until May 10th, you can also save 33% on the full game or 25% off the Splatoon 2 + Octo Expansion bundle in Nintendo eShop.
